pageContext.Name: Navy Floral Lehenga 10-12 (bust 40")
pageContext.Description:
Blue chiffon floral print lehenga with hand embroidered blouse drop gem detailing.

Blouse length - 15"

Cups

Attachable sleeves.

Floral print back and front.

Can-can (netting is at the bottom of the skirt)

This is a bust size 40"

Please ensure you measure yourself correctly as this will ensure you get the right fit.

For your bust size, measure your bust all around in inches at the fullest part. Allow an inch for ease within the outfit.

You can order a larger size and have it adjusted by your tailor.

If you need any help, get in touch with us using the contact form on the website.
